mapper.sql: lang_type, academy, major, grade, classes, school_number, base_number, actual_number, missing_number, missing_rate, pass_number, school_pass_rate, pass_rate, avg_score, max_score
mapper.select: select from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport where id = #{id}
select from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport order by lang_type,academy,major,grade,classes

select lang_type as langType, '合计' as academy, sum(school_number) as schoolNumber, sum(base_number) as baseNumber, sum(actual_number) as actualNumber, sum(missing_number) as missingNumber, sum(pass_number) as passNumber, avg(avg_score) as avgScore, max(max_score) as maxScore from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport group by lang_type

select lang_type as langType, academy as academy, '合计' as major, sum(school_number) as schoolNumber, sum(base_number) as baseNumber, sum(actual_number) as actualNumber, sum(missing_number) as missingNumber, sum(pass_number) as passNumber, avg(avg_score) as avgScore, max(max_score) as maxScore from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport group by lang_type,academy

select lang_type as langType, academy as academy, major as major, '合计' as grade, sum(school_number) as schoolNumber, sum(base_number) as baseNumber, sum(actual_number) as actualNumber, sum(missing_number) as missingNumber, sum(pass_number) as passNumber, avg(avg_score) as avgScore, max(max_score) as maxScore from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport group by lang_type,academy,major

select lang_type as langType, academy as academy, major as major, grade as grade, '合计' as classes, sum(school_number) as schoolNumber, sum(base_number) as baseNumber, sum(actual_number) as actualNumber, sum(missing_number) as missingNumber, sum(pass_number) as passNumber, avg(avg_score) as avgScore, max(max_score) as maxScore from STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport group by lang_type,academy,major,grade

mapper.update:
update STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport
lang_type = #{langType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
academy = #{academy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
major = #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
grade = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classes = #{classes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_number = #{schoolNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_number = #{baseNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
actual_number = #{actualNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
missing_number = #{missingNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
missing_rate = #{missingRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_number = #{passNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
school_pass_rate = #{schoolPassRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pass_rate = #{passRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
avg_score = #{avgScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_score = #{maxScore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where id= #{id}
update STATISTIC_REPORT statisticReport set deleted=1 where id=#{id}
